thread.title: Nivin Pauly launches LL7K trailer
thread.title_full: Nivin Pauly launches LL7K trailer - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: Nivin Pauly launches LL7K trailer
text:
The star-studded promo event of Lord Livingstone 7000 Kandi saw Nivin Pauly launch the film's trailer as well as the audio.
While the Premam actor turned up late for the function, he still managed to steal the show without his simple demeanour. The actor was sporting his buffed look for Action Hero Biju , his own production.
Apart from Nivin, Kunchacko Boban, Bharath and Reenu Mathews were the other stars at the event.
